column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Chocolate croissant - I have a thing for chocolate croissants
column2: so I was very excited for how big and pretty this looked. But when I cut into it
column3: I was disappointed. More than half of the pastry was just air
column4: which is what made it so big. It was a mediocre croissant at best. And again
column5: too greasy. I'm seeing a trend there
column6: and it's not like I don't like butter. For some ready the greasiness here just doesn't taste good. 2/5
